p: Vegetation is primarily mixed-grass prairie dominated by needle-and -thread grass ( Hesperostipa comata), western wheatgrass ( Pascopyrum smithii), threadleaf sedge ( Carex filifolia), blue gramma ( Boutelous gracilis), and little blue-stem ( Schizachyrium scoparium). Cottonwood ( Populus deltoides) gallery forests occur along perennial water courses while hardwood stands of green ash ( Fraxinus pennsylvanica) and chokecherry ( Prunus virginiana) dominate the upland drainages. Dense stands of Rocky Mountain juniper ( Juniper scopulorum) are common on steep north-facing slopes [ 40].
